note.p: Burial: St Bartholomew's Church, near the Royal Exchange

Career: Registrar for probate of wills for Cambrigeshire and the Isle of Ely (1649); Accompanied English ambassadors to Holland to demand justice for his murdered father (1651)Employed as translator and decipherer of intercepted correspondence by Thurloe; Solicitor to the Court of Admiralty (1653); one of the managers of the Post Office (1660)
